trans-unit.source: Allows the control and customization of security behavior for application domains.
trans-unit.target: Gjør at kontrollen og tilpasning av sikkerhet for programdomener.

trans-unit.source: When you create a new <xref:System.AppDomain>, the common language runtime queries the <xref:System.AppDomainManager> for the presence of a HostSecurityManager, which participates in making security decisions for the <xref:System.AppDomain>.
trans-unit.target: Når du oppretter en ny <xref:System.AppDomain>common language runtime spørringer på <xref:System.AppDomainManager>etter en HostSecurityManager, som deltar i gjør sikkerhet avgjørelsene for <xref:System.AppDomain>.</xref:System.AppDomain> </xref:System.AppDomainManager> </xref:System.AppDomain>

trans-unit.source: Host providers should implement a host security manager that inherits from the HostSecurityManager class.
trans-unit.target: Vertsleverandører må implementere vert sikkerhet leder som arver fra HostSecurityManager-klassen.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.HostSecurityManager"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Security.HostSecurityManager"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether an application should be executed.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om et program skal kjøres.

trans-unit.source: This method can be overridden by a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kan overstyres av en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: The base implementation calls the application security manager to determine if the application should be executed.
trans-unit.target: Grunnleggende implementeringen kaller den Programbehandling for sikkerhet for å finne ut om programmet skal utføres.

trans-unit.source: The base implementation does not use the activator evidence.
trans-unit.target: Grunnleggende implementeringen bruker ikke activator bevis.

trans-unit.source: However, an overridden implementation could use the activator evidence to determine the security evidence for the application domain attempting to activate the application.
trans-unit.target: Implementering av overstyrte kan imidlertid bruke activator bevis til å bestemme sikkerhetsbevis for programdomenet forsøk på å aktivere applikasjonen.

trans-unit.source: The evidence for the application to be activated.
trans-unit.target: Bevis for applikasjonen som skal aktiveres.

trans-unit.source: Optionally, the evidence for the activating application domain.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også bevis for aktivering programdomenet.

trans-unit.source: The trust context.
trans-unit.target: Stoler-kontekst.

trans-unit.source: An object that contains trust information about the application.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som inneholder klarering informasjon om programmet.

trans-unit.source: applicationEvidence is .
trans-unit.target: applicationEvidenceis .

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Runtime.Hosting.ActivationArguments"></xref> object could not be found in the application evidence.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Runtime.Hosting.ActivationArguments"> </xref> finner ikke objektet i applikasjonen bevis.

trans-unit.source: -or- The <xref:System.Runtime.Hosting.ActivationArguments.ActivationContext*> property in the activation arguments is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: - eller - <xref:System.Runtime.Hosting.ActivationArguments.ActivationContext*>egenskapen i Aktiveringsargumentene <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Runtime.Hosting.ActivationArguments.ActivationContext*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust"></xref> grant set does not contain the minimum request set specified by the <xref href="System.ActivationContext"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust"> </xref> gi settet ikke inneholder minste forespørselen angitt angitt av den <xref href="System.ActivationContext"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the security policy for the current application domain.
trans-unit.target: Når overstyrt i en avledet klasse, henter sikkerhetspolicyen for gjeldende programdomenet.

trans-unit.source: This property can be overridden in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen kan overstyres i en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: The base implementation always returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer base implementeringen alltid `null`.

trans-unit.source: This property is called at <xref:System.AppDomain> creation time.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen blir kalt i <xref:System.AppDomain>opprettet.</xref:System.AppDomain>

trans-unit.source: It allows a host to supply a policy for the current <xref:System.AppDomain>.
trans-unit.target: Det gjør vert til å angi en policy for gjeldende <xref:System.AppDomain>.</xref:System.AppDomain>

trans-unit.source: A policy level consists of the following: - A set of code groups organized into a single rooted tree.
trans-unit.target: En policy som består av følgende:-et sett med koden grupper som er ordnet i et enkelt rot tre.

trans-unit.source: - A set of named permission sets that are referenced by the code groups to specify permissions to be granted to code belonging to the code group.
trans-unit.target: -Et sett med navngitte tillatelsessett som refererer til code-grupper for å angi tillatelser som skal gis til koden som hører til kode-gruppen.

trans-unit.source: - A list of fully trusted assemblies.
trans-unit.target: – En liste over fullstendig klarerte samlinger.

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > See the Notes to Inheritors for the <xref:System.Security.HostSecurityManager> class for critical implementation information.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > Se merknadene til Inheritors for den <xref:System.Security.HostSecurityManager>klasse kritisk implementering informasjon.</xref:System.Security.HostSecurityManager>

trans-unit.source: The security policy for the current application domain.
trans-unit.target: Sikkerhetspolicyen for gjeldende programdomenet.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method uses code access security (CAS) policy, which is obsolete in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/add/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden bruker (CA) policy for kodetilgangssikkerhet, som er foreldet i den [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/add/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: To enable CAS policy for compatibility with earlier versions of the .NET Framework, use the [<legacyCasPolicy> element](../Topic/%3CNetFx40_LegacySecurityPolicy%3E%20Element.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil aktivere CAS-policy for kompatibilitet med tidligere versjoner av .NET Framework, kan du bruke den [ <legacyCasPolicy> elementet](../Topic/%3CNetFx40_LegacySecurityPolicy%3E%20Element.md).

trans-unit.source: Gets the flag representing the security policy components of concern to the host.
trans-unit.target: Henter flagget som representerer sikkerhet policy komponentene til sikkerhetsproblem verten.

trans-unit.source: This property can be overridden in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen kan overstyres i en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: The base implementation always returns <xref:System.Security.HostSecurityManagerOptions>.
trans-unit.target: Grunnleggende implementeringen alltid returnerer <xref:System.Security.HostSecurityManagerOptions>.</xref:System.Security.HostSecurityManagerOptions>

trans-unit.source: The derived host can change the value of this property when only a subset of the <xref:System.Security.HostSecurityManagerOptions> is of interest.
trans-unit.target: Avledede verten kan endre verdien for denne egenskapen når bare et delsett av den <xref:System.Security.HostSecurityManagerOptions>er interessant.</xref:System.Security.HostSecurityManagerOptions>

trans-unit.source: The possible subsets include none, the refused set, the policy level, and assembly evidence.
trans-unit.target: Mulig delsett omfatter ingen, avslått sett, policynivå og samlingsbevis.

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that specifies security policy components.
trans-unit.target: En av opplistingsverdiene som som angir sikkerhet policy komponenter.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Security.HostSecurityManagerOptions"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref href="System.Security.HostSecurityManagerOptions"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Requests a specific evidence type for the application domain.
trans-unit.target: Ber om en bestemt bevis type for programdomenet.

trans-unit.source: This method can be overridden by a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kan overstyres av en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: The base implementation returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer base implementeringen `null`.

trans-unit.source: The common language runtime calls this method when evidence of the specified type is needed for the current <xref:System.AppDomain>.
trans-unit.target: Common language runtime kaller opp denne metoden når bevis på den angitte typen er nødvendig for gjeldende <xref:System.AppDomain>.</xref:System.AppDomain>

trans-unit.source: The returned value is used as host-supplied evidence, and is stored in the <xref:System.AppDomain.Evidence%2A> collection of the <xref:System.AppDomain.CurrentDomain%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Den returnerte verdien brukes som vert angitt bevis og lagres i det <xref:System.AppDomain.Evidence%2A>samling av <xref:System.AppDomain.CurrentDomain%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.AppDomain.CurrentDomain%2A> </xref:System.AppDomain.Evidence%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Security.Policy.Evidence.GetAssemblyEvidence%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to obtain the generated evidence from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke den <xref:System.Security.Policy.Evidence.GetAssemblyEvidence%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metode for å hente genererte bevis fra samlingen.</xref:System.Security.Policy.Evidence.GetAssemblyEvidence%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To get a callback to this method, hosts must specify the <xref:System.Security.HostSecurityManagerOptions> flag in the <xref:System.Security.HostSecurityManager.Flags%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du trenger en tilbakeringing til denne metoden, verter må angi den <xref:System.Security.HostSecurityManagerOptions>flagg i den <xref:System.Security.HostSecurityManager.Flags%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Security.HostSecurityManager.Flags%2A> </xref:System.Security.HostSecurityManagerOptions>

trans-unit.source: This method of generating evidence allows hosts to delay evidence generation for an <xref:System.AppDomain> until the evidence is needed.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden for generering av bevis tillater verter å utsette bevis generering for en <xref:System.AppDomain>før bevis er nødvendig.</xref:System.AppDomain>

trans-unit.source: In the .NET Framework version 3.5 and earlier versions, it was necessary to provide <xref:System.AppDomain> evidence at load time by overriding the <xref:System.Security.HostSecurityManager.ProvideAppDomainEvidence%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Det er nødvendig for å angi i .NET Framework, versjon 3.5 og tidligere versjoner <xref:System.AppDomain>bevis ved innlasting av overstyrer den <xref:System.Security.HostSecurityManager.ProvideAppDomainEvidence%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Security.HostSecurityManager.ProvideAppDomainEvidence%2A> </xref:System.AppDomain>

trans-unit.source: We recommend that you use GenerateAppDomainEvidence to provide evidence instead of overriding <xref:System.Security.HostSecurityManager.ProvideAppDomainEvidence%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Vi anbefaler at du bruker GenerateAppDomainEvidence oppgi bevis i stedet for overstyrer <xref:System.Security.HostSecurityManager.ProvideAppDomainEvidence%2A>.</xref:System.Security.HostSecurityManager.ProvideAppDomainEvidence%2A>

trans-unit.source: The GenerateAppDomainEvidence method is called back into only for types of evidence that the host has specified in the override of the <xref:System.Security.HostSecurityManager.GetHostSuppliedAppDomainEvidenceTypes%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Metoden GenerateAppDomainEvidence kalles tilbake til bare for typer bevis verten er angitt i overstyring av den <xref:System.Security.HostSecurityManager.GetHostSuppliedAppDomainEvidenceTypes%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Security.HostSecurityManager.GetHostSuppliedAppDomainEvidenceTypes%2A>

trans-unit.source: A return value of `null` indicates that the host cannot generate evidence of this specific type.
trans-unit.target: En returverdi av `null` indikerer at verten ikke kan generere bevis på denne spesifikk type.

trans-unit.source: The evidence type.
trans-unit.target: Bevis-typen.

trans-unit.source: The requested application domain evidence.
trans-unit.target: Det forespurte programmet domene bevis.

trans-unit.source: Requests a specific evidence type for the assembly.
trans-unit.target: Ber om en bestemt bevis-type for samlingen.

trans-unit.source: This method can be overridden by a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kan overstyres av en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: The base implementation returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer base implementeringen `null`.

trans-unit.source: The common language runtime calls this method when evidence of the specified type is needed for the current assembly.
trans-unit.target: Common language runtime kaller opp denne metoden når bevis på den angitte typen er nødvendig for gjeldende samlingen.

trans-unit.source: The returned value is used as host-supplied evidence, and is stored in the <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.Evidence%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Den returnerte verdien brukes som vert angitt bevis og lagres i det <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.Evidence%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.Evidence%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Security.Policy.Evidence.GetAssemblyEvidence%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to obtain the generated evidence from the <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.Evidence%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke den <xref:System.Security.Policy.Evidence.GetAssemblyEvidence%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metode for å hente genererte bevis fra den <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.Evidence%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.Evidence%2A> </xref:System.Security.Policy.Evidence.GetAssemblyEvidence%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To get a callback to this method, hosts must specify the <xref:System.Security.HostSecurityManagerOptions> flag in the <xref:System.Security.HostSecurityManager.Flags%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du trenger en tilbakeringing til denne metoden, verter må angi den <xref:System.Security.HostSecurityManagerOptions>flagg i den <xref:System.Security.HostSecurityManager.Flags%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Security.HostSecurityManager.Flags%2A> </xref:System.Security.HostSecurityManagerOptions>

trans-unit.source: This method of generating evidence allows hosts to delay evidence generation for an <xref:System.AppDomain> until the evidence is needed.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden for generering av bevis tillater verter å utsette bevis generering for en <xref:System.AppDomain>før bevis er nødvendig.</xref:System.AppDomain>

trans-unit.source: In the .NET Framework 3.5 and earlier versions, it was necessary to provide <xref:System.AppDomain> evidence at load time by overriding the <xref:System.Security.HostSecurityManager.ProvideAppDomainEvidence%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Det er nødvendig for å angi i .NET Framework 3.5 og tidligere versjoner <xref:System.AppDomain>bevis ved innlasting av overstyrer den <xref:System.Security.HostSecurityManager.ProvideAppDomainEvidence%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Security.HostSecurityManager.ProvideAppDomainEvidence%2A> </xref:System.AppDomain>

trans-unit.source: We recommend that you use GenerateAssemblyEvidence to provide evidence instead of overriding <xref:System.Security.HostSecurityManager.ProvideAssemblyEvidence%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Vi anbefaler at du bruker GenerateAssemblyEvidence oppgi bevis i stedet for overstyrer <xref:System.Security.HostSecurityManager.ProvideAssemblyEvidence%2A>.</xref:System.Security.HostSecurityManager.ProvideAssemblyEvidence%2A>

trans-unit.source: The GenerateAssemblyEvidence method is called back into only for types of evidence that the host has specified in the override of the <xref:System.Security.HostSecurityManager.GetHostSuppliedAssemblyEvidenceTypes%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Metoden GenerateAssemblyEvidence kalles tilbake til bare for typer bevis verten er angitt i overstyring av den <xref:System.Security.HostSecurityManager.GetHostSuppliedAssemblyEvidenceTypes%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Security.HostSecurityManager.GetHostSuppliedAssemblyEvidenceTypes%2A>

trans-unit.source: A return value of `null` indicates that the host cannot generate evidence of this specific type.
trans-unit.target: En returverdi av `null` indikerer at verten ikke kan generere bevis på denne spesifikk type.

trans-unit.source: The evidence type.
trans-unit.target: Bevis-typen.

trans-unit.source: The target assembly.
trans-unit.target: Target-samlingen.

trans-unit.source: The requested assembly evidence.
trans-unit.target: Den forespurte samlingsbevis.

trans-unit.source: Determines which evidence types the host can supply for the application domain, if requested.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer hvilke bevis verten kan levere for programdomenet, hvis forespurt.

trans-unit.source: This method can be overridden by a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kan overstyres av en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: The base implementation returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer base implementeringen `null`.

trans-unit.source: The types returned by this method determine whether the <xref:System.Security.HostSecurityManager.GenerateAppDomainEvidence%2A> method is called back into.
trans-unit.target: Typer som returneres av denne metoden bestemme om den <xref:System.Security.HostSecurityManager.GenerateAppDomainEvidence%2A>metoden tilbake til.</xref:System.Security.HostSecurityManager.GenerateAppDomainEvidence%2A>

trans-unit.source: The presence of a type in this list does not mean that the host must be able to generate this evidence type, but that it may be able to.
trans-unit.target: Finnes en type i denne listen betyr ikke at verten må kunne generere slike bevis, men at det kanskje.

trans-unit.source: For that reason, it is best to over-specify rather than under-specify the types in this list.
trans-unit.target: Derfor er det best å angi overbelastet i stedet for under-angi typene i denne listen.

trans-unit.source: An array of evidence types.
trans-unit.target: En matrise av bevis typer.

trans-unit.source: Determines which evidence types the host can supply for the assembly, if requested.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer hvilke bevis verten kan oppgi for samlingen, hvis forespurt.

trans-unit.source: This method can be overridden by a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kan overstyres av en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: The base implementation returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer base implementeringen `null`.

trans-unit.source: The types returned by this method determine whether the <xref:System.Security.HostSecurityManager.GenerateAssemblyEvidence%2A> method is called back into.
trans-unit.target: Typer som returneres av denne metoden bestemme om den <xref:System.Security.HostSecurityManager.GenerateAssemblyEvidence%2A>metoden tilbake til.</xref:System.Security.HostSecurityManager.GenerateAssemblyEvidence%2A>

trans-unit.source: The presence of a type in this list does not mean that the host must be able to generate this evidence type, but that it may be able to.
trans-unit.target: Finnes en type i denne listen betyr ikke at verten må kunne generere slike bevis, men at det kanskje.

trans-unit.source: For that reason, it is best to over-specify rather than under-specify the types in this list.
trans-unit.target: Derfor er det best å angi overbelastet i stedet for under-angi typene i denne listen.

trans-unit.source: The target assembly.
trans-unit.target: Target-samlingen.

trans-unit.source: An array of evidence types.
trans-unit.target: En matrise av bevis typer.

trans-unit.source: Provides the application domain evidence for an assembly being loaded.
trans-unit.target: Gir programmet domene bevis for en samling som lastes inn.

trans-unit.source: This method can be overridden in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kan overstyres i en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: This method is called whenever an <xref:System.AppDomain> object is created.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kalles når en <xref:System.AppDomain>objekt er opprettet.</xref:System.AppDomain>

trans-unit.source: The `inputEvidence` parameter is the computed evidence from the common language runtime.
trans-unit.target: Den `inputEvidence` parameteren er beregnet bevis fra common language runtime.

trans-unit.source: The host implementation can choose to extend or reduce the evidence.
trans-unit.target: Vert-implementering kan velge å utvide eller redusere bevis.

trans-unit.source: The return value is the evidence to be used for the application domain.
trans-unit.target: Verdien som returneres er bevis som skal brukes for programdomenet.

trans-unit.source: The base implementation always returns the evidence object passed in as the `inputEvidence` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Grunnleggende implementeringen alltid returnerer bevis-objektet som ble sendt i som den `inputEvidence` parameteren.

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > See the Notes to Inheritors for the <xref:System.Security.HostSecurityManager> class for critical implementation information.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > Se merknadene til Inheritors for den <xref:System.Security.HostSecurityManager>klasse kritisk implementering informasjon.</xref:System.Security.HostSecurityManager>

trans-unit.source: Additional evidence to add to the <xref href="System.AppDomain"></xref> evidence.
trans-unit.target: Ekstra bevis til å legge til den <xref href="System.AppDomain"> </xref> bevis.

trans-unit.source: The evidence to be used for the <xref href="System.AppDomain"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Tegn som skal brukes for det <xref href="System.AppDomain"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Provides the assembly evidence for an assembly being loaded.
trans-unit.target: Beviser samlingen for en samling som lastes inn.

trans-unit.source: This method can be overridden in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kan overstyres i en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: This method is called whenever an assembly is loaded, either implicitly or explicitly.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kalles når en samling som er lastet inn, implisitt eller eksplisitt.

trans-unit.source: The passed in parameters are the assembly being loaded, and the computed evidence from the common language runtime.
trans-unit.target: De angitte parameterne er samlingen lastes og beregnede bevis fra common language runtime.

trans-unit.source: The host implementation can choose to extend or reduce the evidence.
trans-unit.target: Vert-implementering kan velge å utvide eller redusere bevis.

trans-unit.source: The return value is the evidence to be used for the assembly.
trans-unit.target: Verdien som returneres er bevis som skal brukes for samlingen.

trans-unit.source: The base implementation always returns the evidence object passed in as the `inputEvidence` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Grunnleggende implementeringen alltid returnerer bevis-objektet som ble sendt i som den `inputEvidence` parameteren.

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > See the Notes to Inheritors for the <xref:System.Security.HostSecurityManager> class for critical implementation information.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > Se merknadene til Inheritors for den <xref:System.Security.HostSecurityManager>klasse kritisk implementering informasjon.</xref:System.Security.HostSecurityManager>

trans-unit.source: The loaded assembly.
trans-unit.target: Laste inn samlingen.

trans-unit.source: Additional evidence to add to the assembly evidence.
trans-unit.target: Ekstra bevis til å legge til samlingsbevis.

trans-unit.source: The evidence to be used for the assembly.
trans-unit.target: Tegn som skal brukes for samlingen.

trans-unit.source: Determines what permissions to grant to code based on the specified evidence.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer tillatelse til å gi til koden basert på den angitte bevis.

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the security policy engine, providing it with the specified evidence.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden aktiverer policy-motoren for sikkerhet, og gir den angitte bevis.

trans-unit.source: The result is determined by the security policy.
trans-unit.target: Resultatet er avhengig av sikkerhetspolicyen.

trans-unit.source: The evidence set used to evaluate policy.
trans-unit.target: Bevis angitt brukes til å evaluere policy.

trans-unit.source: The permission set that can be granted by the security system.
trans-unit.target: Tillatelsessettet som kan gis av sikkerhetssystemet.

trans-unit.source: evidence is .
trans-unit.target: evidenceis .
